The Bengal cat is a unique and prestigious breed that combines a wild leopard-like appearance with a friendly domestic temperament. Its glossy coat with distinct spots or rosettes and muscular body structure make it truly eye-catching.Known for high intelligence, energy, and social behavior, Bengals form strong bonds with their owners.
